p: For the cytotoxicity assay, statistical analysis was performed using the mean values of at least three independent replicates using GraphPad Prism version 7.00 for Windows, GraphPad Software, La Jolla California USA by applying the log (inhibitor) vs. response—Variable slope analysis. For the Scratch assay, statistical analysis was performed using the Two-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s multiple comparisons test (using GraphPad Prism version 7.00 for Windows, GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA, USA) with a significance level of 5% ( p ˂ 0.05). All data are presented as mean values with the corresponding standard deviation indicated (mean ± SD).
